data.title: Beautiful theater and great shows.
data.text: It's one of the top 5 largest community theatre's in the country, and their shows are very well produced. They also have a world class School of Theatre Arts teaching everything from improv comedy, to musical theatre, acting, and behind the scenes craft like lighting, sound and make-up. And unlike many places, you can see a show for an affordable price, with live orchestra and very talented performers.
